summary: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.
cast: Tiger Hu Chen|Keanu Reeves|Karen Mok|Hai Yu|Qing Ye|Simon Yam|Yasuyuki Hirata|Brian Siswojo|Michael Tong|Sam Lee|Jiulong Guo|Huang Jiang Xiang|Zihan Xia|Sung-jun Yoo|Iko Uwais|Troy Sandford|Kun Ju|Jeremy Marinas|Brahim Chab|Alain Ngalani|Zha Ka|Ocean Hou|'Big Bear' Yin Chun Xiong|Chen Chao|Li Xingping|Jun He|Silvio Simac|Haifeng Ni|Hao Yang|Wen Huan Liu|Min Zhou|Tan Wei Ya|Yu Na|Xiao Wang|Wu Yong Tai|Chengqi Gong|Xiao Dong Zhao|Wu Ming|Jiang Wei|Michael Chan|Steven Dasz|Hélène Siwan Leclerc|Woo-Ping Yuen
title: El poder del Tai Chi
